fluency1: Sophisticated use of idiom, metaphor, and literary allusion
fluency2: compression/stretching of time ("story time" vs. real world time)
fluency3: Sentences and paragraphs flow logically and naturally
fluency5: Symbolism established within the world of the story
flexibility1: Story is relevant/sensical to audience with different degrees of context
flexibility2: A wide range of references and topics are made to cohere
flexibility3: Lessons and themes are broadly applicable
originality1: Plot that is surprising rather than cliche
originality2: Characters/settings/events that play with and subvert common tropes, rather than adhering to them or ignoring them
originality3: Word choice is unexpected and "fresh," rather than common and autocompleted
elaboration1: Obscure subjects are explained in full while obvious subjects speak for themselves
elaboration2: Characters/settings are rich with particular details
elaboration3: Text operates at multiple "levels" of meaning (surface and subtext)
name: MicahCash
